content: next 5 sts shell in chain-2 space double_crochet in next 5 sts 11 times skip last st turn 168 double_crochet row 10 rs - slip_stitch in next st chain 3 double_crochet in next 5 sts shell in chain-2 space double_crochet in next 6 sts skip 2 sts double_crochet in next 6 sts shell in chain-2 space double_crochet in next 6 sts 11 times skip last st turn 192 double_crochet row 11 ws - slip_stitch in next st chain 3 double_crochet in next 6 sts v-st in chain-2 space double_crochet in next 7 sts skip 2 sts double_crochet in next 7 sts v-st in chain-2 space double_crochet in next 7 sts 11 times skip last st turn 192 double_crochet row 12 rs - slip_stitch in next st chain 3 double_crochet in next 6 sts shell in chain-2 space double_crochet in next 7 sts skip 2 sts double_crochet in next 7 sts shell in chain-2 space double_crochet in next 7 sts 11 times skip last st finish off 216 double_crochet pattern has been established in all row you wish to change yarn colors always start fresh color on rs skip 1st st and join new color with a sdc stitch in the bl of the next st work remaining stitches of the first row of a new color in the bl only when you encounter the chain-2 space work as normal don t work in bl of the chain-2 space you should be able to work the afghan using the following information now the number of double_crochet will increase on each row as you work stitches in the chain-2 spaces row 13 rs cranberry - use bl and shell row 14 rs forest - use bl and v-st row 15 rs cranberry - use bl and shell row 16 rs white - use bl and shell row 17 ws white - use both loops and v-st row 18 rs white - use both loops and shell row 19 ws white - use both loops and shell row 20 rs white - use both loops and v-st row 21 rs forest - use bl and shell row 22 ws forest - use both loops and shell row 23 rs forest - use both loops and v-st row 24 rs white - use bl and shell row 25 ws white - use both loops and shell row 26 rs white - use both loops and v-st row 27 ws white - use both loops and shell row 28 rs white - use both loops and shell row 29 rs cranberry - use bl and v-st row 30 ws cranberry - use both loops and shell row 31 rs cranberry - use both loops and shell if you d like you can make a chain any length you d like using any color yarn and weave in and out of the gaps in round one and use this as a tie created by donna mason-svara aka smoothfox smoothfoxlover@yahoo com 2009 this pattern has been tested
